column4: ooh, anyone know if my DHCP clients table listing the main pc (Fujitsu) as both 192.168.1.100 and ...101, with my laptop not being listed on the table (yet being given ...101) could be my issue (not an ubuntu issue i know, but if anyone has an idea, it'd be greatly appreciated)
however it's listing the MAC of my laptop card with the name of the other pc
What command are you running to get this info. Could you post it?
I don't really understand you problem. If you like you can pm me
